headline: LEYBOLD ROTARY VANE MECHANICAL VACUUM PUMP 13.4 CFM
description: Two Stage Rotary Vane Pump-- Perfluoropolyether (PFPE) prepped         Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model D16B
Pumping Speed 13.4 CFM (378.7 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 7.50E-5(En) torr (10.00E-5 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Two-Stage YES
Gas Ballast Yes
Motor Horsepower .75 HP
Rotational Speed 1,725 RPM
Oil Type Fomblin TM
Oil Capacity Maximum: 0.47 L (0.50 qt, 0.10 Br gal)
Other Information

Perfluoropolyether (PFPE) oil prepped

Power Input: 115V/ 208-230V,

Power Requirements 115/ 230 V 9.4 A 4.7 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 7.000 in (17.8 cm)
Depth 21.000 in (53.3 cm)
Height 9.000 in (22.9 cm)
Weight 78 lb (35 kg)
